If he really cared about making jobs, he wouldnâ€™t try to keep trans people from serving in the military. He wouldnâ€™t try to allow businesses to keep discriminating against LGBT people. The app itself asks you to text 88022. 88 is an infamous dog whistle because H is the 8th letter in the alphabet. 88=HH which is code for, well â€œHail Hitler.â€ You canâ€™t get more on the nose than that. If he cared about Americans and what they have to say, he wouldnâ€™t have initiated â€œMartials Lawâ€ on Antifa. Antifa is not an organization, itâ€™s an ideology for â€œanti fascism.â€ That sounds bad until you realize that fascist are people like Mussolini and Hitler. So essentially, Trump is calling Anti Fascist the bad guys and Pro Fascist the good guys. Excuse me?!?!?! And letâ€™s not forget that Ronald Regan tried to do the same things against liberals, except instead of calling them anti fascist, he called them communist. If thatâ€™s not enough to convince you that Trump only cares about himself and his hateful ideologies, I donâ€™t know what to tell you. Even if youâ€™re Republican, you are still a human.And you should realize that what Trump has done, is doing, and will continue to do is incredibly fricked. Go research why people arenâ€™t voting for trump. Listen to them instead of writing everyone who disagrees with you as a â€œlibtard.â€
